Reviews.Title: Super large screen.Awesome phone !
Reviews.Author: saun
Reviews.Content: With so many options available online for unlocked android phones it is a huge task to select the right one.Reviews can be confusing especially if they are mixed.I went for this one because it had a huge brand Lightahead behind it and found that generally their phones have good reviews and I have purchased from them before.Yes it was a good decision.The phone has some great qualities.Instant easy set up.Super call quality.Fast playstore and many other useful apps installed already.Good camera.Super large screen especially for watching movies.Great sound.Super quadcore processor making it fast and easy for multitasking.Easy downloading of apps.Instant wifi and Bluetooth connectivity.Great wifi range.Incredible price for all the above.Yes I love it.
